mapper.update: update t_bpm_variable_multiplayer_personnel tbvmp inner join t_bpm_variable_multiplayer tbvm on tbvmp.variable_multiplayer_id = tbvm.id inner join t_bpm_variable tbv on tbvm.variable_id = tbv.id set tbvmp.undertake_status=0 where tbv.process_num = #{processNum}

update t_bpm_variable_multiplayer_personnel tbvmp inner join t_bpm_variable_multiplayer tbvm on tbvmp.variable_multiplayer_id = tbvm.id inner join t_bpm_variable tbv on tbvm.variable_id = tbv.id set tbvmp.is_del=1 , tbvmp.remark='管理员减签' where tbv.process_num = #{processNum} and tbvm.element_id=#{elementId} and tbvmp.assignee=#{assignee}
